list.abs: 2 ( Xinhua ) 2 according to foreign reports , the colombian police said they found in the northern province of la sila 2.2 tons of drugs buried in the ground .中新网9月2日电据外电2日报道，哥伦比亚警方表示，他们在北部拉瓜西拉省发现了2.2吨被埋在地下的毒品。

entry.tran: 哥伦比亚的;哥伦比亚人的;哥伦比亚文化的
entry.def: Colombian means belonging or relating to Colombia or its people or culture.
A Colombian is a Colombian citizen, or a person of Colombian origin.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Colombia
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Colombia or its people;

auth_sentence.content: Most Colombian exports enter the United States duty free.

Sentence.sentence: For example, a Colombian who wants someone to approach him often signals with a hand movement in which all the fingers of one hand, cupped, point downward as they move rapidly back and forth.

Speakers or English have a similar gesture through the hand may not be cupped and the fingers may be held more loosely, but for them the gesture means goodbye or go away, quite the opposite of the Colombian gesture
